page.title: 07A Day In My Life
page.content: I wake up at 7.45, get dressed and go downstairs. I have breakfast (normally cereal and orange juice). Next I brush my teeth. Then my mum packs my lunch, while I watch T.V. At 8.40 my mum takes me to school in the car. The 9.00 bell rings and we all go to our classes. After registration we go into the hall for assembly. Afterwards we come back and normally do maths till 10.35 which is breaktime. We get our tuck and play in the playground for 15 minutes. When we come in we do some English work until lunchtime. We have our lunch then go over to the field. We play football. At 1.10 we go back to our classes. We get changed to play rounders. After an hour we come back and change. For the last hour we do project or enviromental work. At 3.15 we go home.
